title: ﻿क्या कांग्रेस नेता ने ही हार्दिक पटेल को थप्पड़ मारा ?
author: www.factcrescendo.com
vclaim: Mahendra Baghedia, SP Surendranagar, Gujarat on Tarun Gajjar (who slapped Hardik Patel at a rally earlier today): The man is not affiliated to any party, he is a common man. Law is taking its own course. pic.twitter.com/DIOgnqMMvi
